producers.name: Agincourt Health and socioeconomic Intervention Projects

version_statement.version_notes: Initial COVID-19 individual questionnaire implementation across SAPRIN nodes

study_info.abstract: SAPRIN COVID-19 Individual Questionnaires collected individual-level data on psychological distress, mental health impacts, and behavioral responses to the COVID-19 pandemic across three major SAPRIN surveillance sites (Agincourt, DIMAMO, and AHRI) in South Africa during the initial pandemic response.
study_info.geog_coverage: SAPRIN Demographic Surveillance Sites: Agincourt (Limpopo), DIMAMO (Limpopo), AHRI (KwaZulu-Natal)
study_info.data_kind: Cross-sectional survey with psychological assessment scales
study_info.universe: All household members in SAPRIN DSS sites sampled during COVID-19 outbreak response period
